SELECT t.code ,t.status ,t.to_code ,t.from_user ,t.from_role ,t.from_datetime ,t.dealer ,t.deal_datetime ,t.deal_note ,ts.company_code ,ts.quote_min ,ts.quote_max ,jc.name as company_name ,ts.name as serve_name ,jc.contacts as company_user ,jc.mobile as company_mobile ,ju.real_name as user_name ,ju.mobile as user_mobile FROM ((tcp_intention t inner join tcp_serve ts on t.to_code = ts.code) INNER JOIN ${userDB}.tstd_company jc on ts.company_code = jc.code) INNER JOIN ${userDB}.tstd_user ju ON t.from_user = ju.user_id
t.${order}

SELECT count(1) FROM ((tcp_intention t inner join tcp_serve ts on t.to_code = ts.code) INNER JOIN ${userDB}.tstd_company jc on ts.company_code = jc.code) INNER JOIN ${userDB}.tstd_user ju ON t.from_user = ju.user_id
